## Conclusions

### Decontamination Methods
-   Negative control samples are essential to avoid spurious taxa.
-   Each batch has it own contaminant profile.
-   In our study, thoroughly removing contaminant such as Nejman et al. procedure outperforms others.

\pause
### Intratumor microbiome in PDAC
-   Technical replica and various decontamination methods with proper negative controls could yield a reliable set of intratunmor microbiota.
-   Most of identified taxa are well-known gut microbiota.
